title: [Control systems] Siemens security advisory (AV25-749)
description: On November 11, 2025, Siemens published advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: SICAM P850 family  versions prior to V3.11
SICAM P855 family  versions prior to V3.11
SIPLUS LOGO! V8.4 BM  all versions
Spectrum Power 4  versions prior to V4.70 SP12 Update 2
Siemens Software Center  versions prior to V3.5
Solid Edge SE2025  versions prior to V225.0 Update 10
Altair Grid Engine  versions prior to V2026.0.0
Solid Edge SE2025  versions prior to V225.0 Update 11
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
